sentences.en: A bitterly cold winter damaged industrial output and trade.
sentences.cn: 严寒的冬天损害了工业生产和贸易.

sentences.en: Average grain output per mu has reached 1300 jin.
Due to low investment, industrial output has remained stagnant.
sentences.cn: 由于投资少, 工业生产一直停滞不前.

sentences.en: Grain output reached a new high in the three years.
sentences.cn: 谷物产量达到三年中最高水平.

sentences.en: In order to maximize profit the firm would seek to maximize output.
sentences.cn: 为了获得最大利润，这家公司会把产量增至最大。

sentences.en: Output is up 30% on last year.
Output of steel has increased by 5 per cent.
sentences.cn: 钢产量增加了百分之五.

sentences.en: The annual output of the steel plant amounts to 500000 tons.
sentences.cn: 这家钢铁厂的年产量达500000吨.

sentences.en: The output has been doubled in the past five years.
sentences.cn: 过去5年中产量翻了一番.

sentences.en: The output is twice as much as that of ten years ago.
The output of 13 major products has increased by a wide margin.
sentences.cn: 13项主要产品的产量都有大幅度增长.

sentences.en: The total output is double that of last year.
Their total grain output still exceeded that of the previous year.
sentences.cn: 他们的粮食总产量仍超过头一年.

sentences.en: There was a slackening of western output during the 1930s.
sentences.cn: 20世纪30年代西部的产出有所减少。

sentences.en: They drew up a detailed list of measures for increasing the output.
sentences.cn: 他们制定了增产的详细措施.

sentences.en: You run the software, you look at the output, you make modifications.
sentences.cn: 运行这个软件，看看输出信息，并做修改。

phrases.tran_cn: 经济产出；经济产量，流量
输出转矩；输出力矩；输出扭矩
总产量；总输出量；总功率

trans.tran_cn: 产量，输出，输出端，输出量
trans.tran_en: the amount of goods or work produced by a person, machine, factory etc
if a computer outputs information, it produces it
if a computer outputs information, it produces it
